    • 方法详细资料

      • addCategory

        public void addCategory(java.lang.String token,
               java.lang.String nodePath,
               java.lang.String catId)
                 throws VersionException,
                        LockException,
                        PathNotFoundException,
                        AccessDeniedException,
                        RepositoryException,
                        DatabaseException
        从接口复制的说明: PropertyModule
        Add a category to a node.
        指定者:
        addCategory 在接口中 PropertyModule
        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        catId - Category id (the UUID of the category node).
        抛出:
        VersionException - A document checked in can't be modified.
        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no node in this repository path.
        AccessDeniedException - If there is any security problem: you can't modify the node because of lack of permissions.
        RepositoryException - If there is any general repository problem.
        DatabaseException

        参数:
        token - The session authorization token.
        nodePath - The complete path to the node.
        keyword - The keyword to be added.
        抛出:

        LockException - A locked document can't be modified.
        PathNotFoundException - If there is no node in this repository path.
